dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, seriously, is this Kaspi.kz thing even real? Like, I saw something about them hitting nine million users, but come on. That sounds… a bit much, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, seriously, is this the website thing even real? Like, I saw something about them hitting nine million users, but come on. That sounds... a bit much, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our Kaspi.kz Super App has now reached 8.5 million monthly users, further cementing its market leading position.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, uh, it's pretty real, actually. Mikhail Lomtadze, their CEO, just announced it. Nine million monthly users, in their Super App.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, uh, it's pretty real, actually. Mikhail Lomtadze, their C E O, just announced it. Nine million monthly users, in their Super App.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz, commented: Our Kaspi.kz Super App has now reached 8.5 million monthly users, further cementing its market leading position.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nine million? In… where is this again? Kazakhstan? That’s, uh, huge for that market, no?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nine million? In... where is this again? Kazakhstan? That's, uh, huge for that market, no?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Kazakhstan. And honestly, it is. They've seen, like, a twenty percent increase just this last quarter. It's kind of staggering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Kazakhstan. And honestly, it is. They've seen, like, a twenty percent increase just this last quarter. It's kind of staggering.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Staggering. Okay. And they’re saying their e-commerce is, uh, the "best"? Who even decides that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Staggering. Okay. And they're saying their e-commerce is, uh, the best? Who even decides that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, they were awarded 'Best E-Commerce Platform in Central Asia.' It's seamlessly integrated into the app.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, they were awarded 'Best E-Commerce Platform in Central Asia.' It's seamlessly integrated into the app.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our e-Commerce platform, the largest e-commerce business in the country, is seamlessly integrated into our app... The TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking is compiled annually by Forbes Kazakhstan...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, "super app." Is that just a fancy name for, uh, having a lot of stuff in one place?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, super app. Is that just a fancy name for, uh, having a lot of stuff in one place?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Kinda, but, like, a lot of well-integrated stuff. They're even about to launch a new, revolutionary AI recommendation engine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kinda, but, like, a lot of well-integrated stuff. They're even about to launch a new, revolutionary A I recommendation engine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: An AI engine? Okay. And, um, what are they selling? Is it just… local stuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An A I engine? Okay. And, um, what are they selling? Is it just... local stuff?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh no. They’ve expanded delivery to sixty cities and have over 450,000 products. Even exclusive partnerships with global luxury brands.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh no. They've expanded delivery to sixty cities and have over four hundred fifty thousand products. Even exclusive partnerships with global luxury brands.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have expanded delivery to 54 cities and increased the range of products to almost 400,000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Luxury brands? On an app in Kazakhstan? That sounds, uh, like a big jump.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Luxury brands? On an app in Kazakhstan? That sounds, uh, like a big jump.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's true. They’ve generated almost 220 billion tenge in revenue this year so far, from nearly three million online purchases. That’s a hundred and thirty-five percent growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's true. They've generated almost two hundred twenty billion tenge in revenue this year so far, from nearly three million online purchases. That's a hundred and thirty-five percent growth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the first eight months of this year, our users made 2.6 million online purchases for almost 200 billion tenge. The amount of purchases grew 125%, the number of purchases by 150% compared to last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So it’s actually, like, helping companies there? Especially, uh, after the pandemic?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So it's actually, like, helping companies there? Especially, uh, after the pandemic?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the context of retail restrictions related to the coronavirus pandemic, our e-Commerce platform is an essential partner for many companies in Kazakhstan. We are helping our retailers increase their sales, grow their business and retain jobs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It’s a crucial lifeline for countless companies in Kazakhstan, helping them, um, thrive and secure livelihoods.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It's a crucial lifeline for countless companies in Kazakhstan, helping them, um, thrive and secure livelihoods.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the context of retail restrictions related to the coronavirus pandemic, our e-Commerce platform is an essential partner for many companies in Kazakhstan. We are helping our retailers increase their sales, grow their business and retain jobs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, who are these "luxury brands" then? Are we talking actual big names?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, who are these luxury brands then? Are we talking actual big names?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, big names. Adidas, Nike, Marks & Spencer, even UGG. And, uh, plenty of prominent domestic brands too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, big names. Adidas, Nike, Marks and Spencer, even U G G. And, uh, plenty of prominent domestic brands too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Such well-known international brands as Adidas, O'STIN, UGG, New balance, SPORTMASTER, KOTON, ALDO, SKECHERS, Ecco, DECATHLON, DeFacto, Marks & Spencer, Nike, Reebok and many others sell through Kaspi.kz e-Commerce platform. Kaspi.kz also works with the countrys most popular domestic brands...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but how do we know it’s actually, like, the top platform?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but how do we know it's actually, like, the top platform?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Forbes Kazakhstan annually publishes the TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking. They collaborate with Baker Tilly and the Digital Association.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forbes Kazakhstan annually publishes the T O P K Z Retail E-Commerce ranking. They collaborate with Baker Tilly and the Digital Association.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking is compiled annually by Forbes Kazakhstan together with the international consulting company Baker Tilly Kazakhstan and the Digital Association of Kazakhstan.
